data.text: «Kɛlɛ, nà-botiɠɛ nui Zakɔɓe ná-nuɓusɛiti,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠaa, nii é è ɓɛtɛni,
Mazɔlɔɔ nà ziɛi ʋu zooi ma, kpɔɔle wɔin ma,
Ta ʋɔnɔ, ti wɔɔlɔ eɠɛ kpalaga tufa wundui,
Ta ɠa ɠɛ ma:
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, Fai-Pɛ-Maliɠii wooi ɠaa,
Ɓɛ ɠa é ga kɛ̀ʋele?
Maaɠili mina ɠɛ wo ma, nà-nuɓusɛiti,
Kɔɔɠɔ gani kpɛtɛ nuiti ti la ga ani nɔpɛ,
Ɓɛ ɠa a ɗa galagi ɓɛtɛ,
Niiti pɛ ti ʋɔɔkpɔsu ti ʋa, ta unfe,
Ɠain bo nui ɠa ɗa kɔlu ɓuɠai ta leʋega,
Gulu zaɠa nui ɠa ɗa kɔɠɔgi wo ga galui,
A sɛdele gului leʋena,
Tama nuɓusɛi ɠa maavai ɠɛɛzu ga niima wuluiti,
É ná-gului ɠilazuʋɛ lɔ abui ɠa,
É gului mɔtai zeɠe,
Niima nuiti, ɠi ge la ti ma,
Ti tanɔpɛ ge la ɠidaazu faa wu,
Zuʋui ɠa é ga ti-ɠɔnɔgiti,
«Izilayɛle, Zakɔɓe ná-nuɓusɛiti, ɠizɛ nii zu ga pagɔ:
Gè ɗa-lɔ koloɠologiti kpalega, ti ɲɛɛlɛ eɠɛ tonaɓiingi.
Geeɠɔlɔgiti à ɠoozunɛ, mazɔlɔɔ Maliɠii ɠa botii ɠɛɛzu,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠaa,
Niizu gè ungaiziɛ nuiti ta-yɛɛ vaiti kɛa ga fuun,
Kɛlɛ nà naa ɠɛ, nii nà-botiɠɛ nui é boni.
Gè ɠɛ kpoloɗɛiti ma:
Nà bosu Siluse ná-faa zu ga:
